name: planning-chess
description: The consensus-based chess inspired estimation game

scripts.build: lerna run build --scope @planning-chess/shared && lerna run build --ignore @planning-chess/shared
scripts.publish: aws lightsail push-container-image --region eu-west-2 --service-name planning-chess-servic --image mykolaszenitech/planning-chess:$VERSION --label node --profile planningchess
scripts.nuke: lerna run nuke --parallel && npm run clean:root

author: Planning Chess
